describe: Luxembourg is a small, landlocked country in Western Europe, bordered by Belgium, France, and Germany. Known for its rich history, medieval castles, and vibrant cultural scene, Luxembourg is one of the world's wealthiest countries and a founding member of the European Union.

cities.name: üèô Luxembourg City
cities.geographical_location: Located in the southern part of the country, Luxembourg City is the capital and largest city of Luxembourg.
cities.climate: Luxembourg City has a temperate oceanic climate with mild summers and cool winters.
cities.famous_cuisine: Judd mat Gaardebounen (smoked pork with broad beans), Bouneschlupp (green bean soup), and Quetschentaart (plum tart).

cities.name: üåÜ Echternach
cities.geographical_location: Echternach is located in eastern Luxembourg, near the border with Germany.
cities.climate: Echternach experiences a temperate climate with moderate rainfall throughout the year.

cities.name: üè∞ Vianden
cities.geographical_location: Vianden is situated in the north of Luxembourg, close to the German border.
cities.climate: Vianden has a temperate climate with cool winters and mild summers.
